About.title: About YifanTech
About.brief: Your trusted partner in professional language services
description_list: Headquartered in Beijing, Beijing Yifan Science and Information Consulting Co,.Ltd is a professional provider of translation, interpretation, language consulting and international communication services, which include proofreading, editing, localization and equipment leasing.

We boast a broad network of translators, interpreters, proofreaders, and language experts, totaling about 120, who have graduated from prestigious universities in China and beyond. Our services cover about 30 languages, enabling us to meet wide-ranging language demands of our Chinese and overseas clients.
By virtue of our excellent service quality, we are honored to provide services to listed companies and big names across over 20 sectors.

Expertise.title: ESG & CSR Report Expertise
description_list: We specialize in translating Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) reports and Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) documents. Our expert linguists understand the nuanced terminology and regulatory requirements across different markets.
With deep knowledge of sustainability frameworks, financial regulations, and corporate governance standards, we ensure your reports maintain their integrity and impact across cultural boundaries.

industries.name: Manufacturing / Industry / Raw Materials

industries.description: Providing ESG/CSR reporting and communication services for manufacturing clients, focusing on green processes, smart manufacturing, and employee well-being to strengthen competitiveness in the global sustainable value chain. Assisting raw materials enterprises in building a responsible image in resource utilization, environmental protection, and supply chain compliance, demonstrating their sustainable commitments in the global industrial chain through ESG/CSR reporting.
